item.title: Elastic Search - Basic Concepts
item.description: Elasticsearch (popularly known as ELK stack) is an open-source, distributed, and near real-time search engine, Which can be used to solve a variety of use-cases. Let’s understand the basic concepts of Elasticsearch in this post.

item.title: Apache Kafka CCDAK Exam Notes
item.description:
Hi Readers,

If you are planning or preparing for Apache Kafka Certification then this is the right place for you.There are many Apache Kafka Certifications are available in the market but CCDAK (Confluent Certified Developer for Apache Kafka) is the most known certification as Kafka is now maintained by Confluent.
